channel.title: 525 rsps help!
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys i have a problem with my rsps. when a new player makes an account it says they are level 3 but when they look at their stats they all say 99. but when you hover over one or any of them it says level 1. 0 xp. and it levels up like normal like when you attack somthing it says like reached level 5 but still says 99 in the stat tab
here is a pic of the problem[/b]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zyj70w.jpg[/img]
[u][b]PLEASE HELP ME![/b][/u]
